CatDescriptText: Charles C. Scott, 7105 Lawton Street, Penn Township, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 22, 1958, pg. 3, with question: "Do you think that there will be an economic depression in near future like the one in the early thirties?" answer reads: "I don't think so. I think that under the present government program, things will be different and there will be more business.  Things probably will break soon."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Charles C. Scott wearing dark hat, eyeglasses, striped shirt, and textured necktie, standing in front of marble facade with windows on either side, including one on left with Valentine cards
